name: inkberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a North American evergreen bush (= one that never loses its leaves) with leaves like leather and black berries (= small, round fruits) : The best shrubs to attract birds are inkberry, winterberry, and common elderberry. Inkberries can grow up to 3 metres tall.
More examplesFewer examplesA hedge of inkberry framed this woodland.The traffic island has been planted with juniper, inkberry, and rhododendron.Inkberry is another great foundation and hedging plant.Inkberry, or gallberry, is an evergreen holly, and does well on drier soils.
